{!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
Good day.
To self-enroll for online access to your fleet account, please go to bottom of the www.wexonline.com page at the Enroll as New User link and enter your account number [ ]and telephone, name. etc. and you will receive a temporary password and can log-in at that point. Others that need online access can use this same process.
Also please see attached information with video links regarding working with your account online.
I would like to set up some time to do a more in depth review of the WEX Online tool. Can you please send me a time that might work for you? You are also welcome to call me directly to schedule.
Welcome to WEX!
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
http://www.wexinc.com/
